mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT ( SELLER, CATEGORY, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_BRAND, NORMAL_PRICE, SALE_PRICE, DISCOUNT, MAIN_IMG, DESCRIPTION, SHIPMENT_TYPE, SHIPMENT_TIME, SHIPPING_PRICE ) VALUES ( #{seller}, #{category}, #{productName}, #{productBrand}, #{normalPrice}, #{salePrice}, #{discountPercent}, #{mainImg}, #{description}, #{shipmentType}, #{shipmentTime}, #{shippingPrice} )

INSERT INTO OPTION_NAME ( OPTIONS_NAME, MAIN_OPTION, OPTIONS_NORMAL_PRICE, OPTIONS_SALE_PRICE, OPTIONS_STOCK, PRODUCT_NO ) VALUES
( #{option.detailOptionName}, #{option.mainDetailOption}, #{option.detailOptionOriginPrice}, #{option.detailOptionSaledPrice}, #{option.detailOptionQuantity}, currval('product_product_no_seq') )
mapper.select: INSERT INTO OPTION_NAME ( OPTIONS_NAME, OPTIONS_NORMAL_PRICE, OPTIONS_SALE_PRICE, OPTIONS_STOCK ) VALUES ( #{detailOptionName}, #{detailOptionOriginPrice}, #{detailOptionSaledPrice}, #{detailOptionQuantity} ) RETURNING *
SELECT PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_BRAND, NORMAL_PRICE, SALE_PRICE, DISCOUNT, MAIN_IMG FROM PRODUCT WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY SCRAP_COUNT DESC LIMIT 4
SELECT PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_BRAND, NORMAL_PRICE, SALE_PRICE, DISCOUNT, MAIN_IMG FROM PRODUCT WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY PRODUCT_DATE DESC LIMIT 4

SELECT PRODUCT_NO, CATEGORY, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_BRAND, NORMAL_PRICE, SALE_PRICE, DISCOUNT, MAIN_IMG, DESCRIPTION, SHIPMENT_TYPE, SHIPMENT_TIME, SHIPPING_PRICE FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT * FROM PRODUCT WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
AND CATEGORY LIKE '야채'
AND CATEGORY LIKE '과일'
AND CATEGORY LIKE '어류'
AND CATEGORY LIKE '육류'
AND CATEGORY LIKE '빵'
AND CATEGORY LIKE '면'
AND CATEGORY LIKE '유제품'
ORDER BY PRODUCT_DATE
ORDER BY PRODUCT_VIEW
ORDER BY SCRAP_COUNT
)

SELECT PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_BRAND, NORMAL_PRICE, SALE_PRICE, DISCOUNT, MAIN_IMG FROM PRODUCT WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
AND CATEGORY LIKE '야채'
